channel.title: CVE Feed for pixelyoursite -- PixelYourSite Pro – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pixelyoursite -- PixelYourSite Pro – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-7870|2024-09-04T14:10:13.933Z -- pixelyoursite -- pixelyoursite%20pro%20%E2%80%93%20your%20smart%20pixel%20%28tag%29%20manager
item.description: The PixelYourSite – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) & API Manager and the PixelYourSite PRO plugins for WordPress are vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 9.7.1 and 10.4.2, respectively, through publicly exposed log files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view potentially sensitive information contained in the exposed log files, and to delete log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-7870|2024-09-04T08:30:37.877Z -- pixelyoursite -- pixelyoursite%20pro%20%E2%80%93%20your%20smart%20pixel%20%28tag%29%20manager
item.description: The PixelYourSite – Your smart PIXEL (TAG) & API Manager and the PixelYourSite PRO plugins for WordPress are vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 9.7.1 and 10.4.2, respectively, through publicly exposed log files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view potentially sensitive information contained in the exposed log files, and to delete log files.
